entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
